events.message: I am reporting a severe roof leak caused by last night's heavy storm that damaged multiple areas inside my house.
The claim has been categorized under Home Damage due to the reported roof leak and subsequent interior flooding.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle this case and will be your primary contact moving forward.
Your claim regarding storm damage and roof leaks has been acknowledged and is now being actively processed.
Please provide photos of the damaged roof, interior affected areas, and the repair estimates from licensed contractors.
All requested documents, including detailed photographs and professional repair quotes, have been submitted successfully.
An adjuster has begun investigating the extent of damage to verify the claim validity and assess repair costs.
The investigation into the roof and interior damage caused by the storm is now complete with all findings documented.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on our assessment, covering the roof repairs and interior restoration costs.
Thank you for the quick and fair settlement proposal; the offer addresses our damages satisfactorily.
Your claim has been formally approved, and we will proceed with disbursing the agreed settlement amount.
The payment for the approved claim has been issued and should reflect in your account shortly.
Your claim is now closed with all payments processed and recorded. Thank you for your cooperation during the investigation.
All claim files and related documents have been securely archived as per company policy for future reference.
